name: Same-sex married households in the US
title: Same-sex married households in the US
description: The series includes data for the period 2005-2008, but these estimates are not comparable to those for the period 2008-2018. This is because of changes in the survey questionnaires. The source notes: "Changes in the questionnaire format and data capture procedures between 2007 and 2008 resulted in significant declines in the estimated number of same-sex partner households in 2008. For more explanation, see the following working paper: https://www.census.gov/library/working-papers/2010/demo/oconnell-01.html"

sources.name: U.S. Census Bureau
sources.additionalInfo: The series includes data for the period 2005-2008, but these estimates are not comparable to those for the period 2008-2018. This is because of changes in the survey questionnaires. The source notes: "Changes in the questionnaire format and data capture procedures between 2007 and 2008 resulted in significant declines in the estimated number of same-sex partner households in 2008. sources.dataPublisherSource: U.S. Census Bureau, 2005 through 2018 American Community Survey 1-year data files

resources.path: Same-sex married households in the US.csv

fields.name: Male-Male married couples
fields.description: Number of same-sex married couples, formed by two men (estimate based on survey data)

fields.name: Female-Female married couples
fields.description: Number of same-sex married couples, formed by two women (estimate based on survey data)
